DOC.HEADLINE: 2 CONFESS TO KILLING ANTI-MOB LAWMAKER
DOC.TEXT: Two small-time drug dealers confessed Thursday to killing a French lawmaker who crusaded against organized_crime and its ties to local politics on the Riviera . The pair were among about 30 people rounded_up Wednesday in the latest sweep by police in Toulon , near Marseilles , since Yann Piat was killed Feb . 25 . The woman ' s slaying threw a spotlight on links between the mob , politics and business on the Riviera , raising the specter of the sort of corruption that has long plagued Italy .
